AT.name: Yoshi's Story™
AT.description: Der geniale Super Mario 64-Schöpfer Shigeru Miyamoto hat ein weiteres fantastisches Spiel mit einem garantiert märchenhaften Ende vorgelegt. Du folgst den Abenteuern von sechs Yoshis und suchst in sonnigen Wäldern, dunklen Höhlen, hoch aufragenden Bergen, feuchten Dschungeln, riesigen Ozeanen und finsteren Burgen nach dem Happybaum, den der gefürchtete Baby Bowser gestohlen hat. Yoshi's Story basiert in groben Zügen auf dem Super Nintendo-Klassiker Yoshi's Island, nutzt jedoch die Stärken des Nintendo 64 voll aus. Yoshi kann gehen, laufen, schwimmen, springen, flattern und mit erstaunlicher Präzision Eier abfeuern. Das Spiel läuft auf "Buchseiten" ab, die aus papierartigem Material und anderen vertrauten Stoffen bestehen - du bekommst also hauchdünne Wälder, Jeans-Wolken und aufblasbare Plastikinseln zu Gesicht. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Yoshi's Story™
AU.description: From the brilliant mind of Super Mario 64 creator Shigeru Miyamoto comes a gorgeous game with a guaranteed storybook ending. Follow the adventures of six Yoshis as they search through sunny woods, dark caves, soaring mountains, steaming jungles, vast oceans and gloomy castles for the Super Happy Tree, which has been stolen by the dreaded Baby Bowser. Loosely based on the Super NES classic Yoshi's Island, Yoshi's Story fully exploits the strengths of the N64. Yoshi can walk, run, swim, leap, flutter and fire his payload of eggs with unerring precision. The action takes place in storybook 'pages' made up of papery materials and other familiar textures – so you'll see wafer-thin forests, denim clouds and inflatable plastic islands. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Yoshi's Story™
BG.description: From the brilliant mind of Super Mario 64 creator Shigeru Miyamoto comes a gorgeous game with a guaranteed storybook ending. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Yoshi's Story™
BE.description: Produit du brillant créateur de Super Mario 64, Shigeru Miyamoto, ce jeu magnifique a une fin digne des livres de contes. Suivez les aventures de six Yoshis dans leur recherche du Super Happy Tree à travers des forêts ensoleillées, des grottes sombres, des montagnes escarpées, des jungles humides, de vastes océans et de lugubres châteaux. L'arbre a été volé par le terrible Baby Bowser. Plus ou moins inspiré de Yoshi's Island, jeu classique de la Super NES, Yoshi's Story exploite pleinement les atouts de la N64. Yoshi peut marcher, courir, nager, bondir, voler et mettre le feu à ses charges d'oeufs avec une précision infaillible. L'action se déroule dans les « pages » du livre de contes constitué de parchemin et autres textures familières, ce qui signifie que vous verrez des forêts minces comme des pelures d'oignon, des nuages en jean et des ôles gonflables en plastique. Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Yoshi's Story™
CA.description: Baby Bowser has taken the Super Happy Tree and put a spell on Yoshi Island. It's up to a few remaining Yoshis to restore everything to its rightful place as they run, ground-pound, flutter-jump, throw eggs, and traverse a colorful and crafted storybook-looking world. Complete a course in Story Mode, and then best your high score in Trial Mode!

ES.name: Yoshi's Story™
ES.description: De la mente brillante del creador de Super Mario 64, Shigeru Miyamoto, surge un precioso juego con final de cuento asegurado. Sigue las aventuras de seis Yoshis mientras registran soleados bosques, oscuras cuevas, elevadas montañas, tórridas junglas, inmensos océanos y sombríos castillos para encontrar el árbol de la Súper Felicidad, que ha sido robado por el temido Baby Bowser. Ligeramente basado en el clásico de Super Nintendo, Yoshi's Island, Yoshi's Story aprovecha totalmente la capacidad de Nintendo 64. Yoshi puede caminar, correr, nadar, brincar, revolotear y disparar su cargamento de huevos con una precisión infalible. La acción se desarrolla en las páginas de un libro de cuentos creados con material que imita el papel y otras texturas familiares, por lo que verás bosques de papel, nubes de tela e islas de plástico inflable. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Yoshi's Story™
IT.description: Dalla mente brillante di Shigeru Miyamoto, creatore di Super Mario 64, ecco un emozionante gioco con un finale da favola garantito. Segui le avventure dei sei Yoshi alla ricerca del Super Happy Tree, rubato dal perfido Baby Bowser, in boschi soleggiati, caverne buie, torreggianti montagne, nebbiose giungle, vasti oceani e solitari castelli. Basato, sia pure solo in misura marginale, sul classico Yoshi's Island di Super NES, Yoshi's Story utilizza in maniera completa le funzionalità di N64. Yoshi è in grado di camminare, correre, nuotare, saltare, svolazzare e sparare il suo carico di uova con una mira infallibile. L'azione si svolge nella 'pagine' di un libro formate da cellulosa e altri materiali che conosci bene. Vedrai dunque foreste sottili come pasta sfoglia, nuvole di cotone e isole gonfiabili in plastica. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MX.name: Yoshi's Story™
MX.description: Bebé Bowser se ha apoderado del Super Happy Tree, y ha dejado un encantamiento en la isla Yoshi. ¡Ayuda a los yoshis a regresar todo a la normalidad! Corre, lanza huevos y revolotea por los aires mientras atraviesas un colorido mundo en forma de libro. Una vez que completes el modo historia, ¡ponte a prueba en Trial Mode!

NO.name: Yoshi's Story™
NO.description: From the brilliant mind of Super Mario 64 creator Shigeru Miyamoto comes a gorgeous game with a guaranteed storybook ending. Follow the adventures of six Yoshis as they search through sunny woods, dark caves, soaring mountains, steaming jungles, vast oceans and gloomy castles for the Super Happy Tree, which has been stolen by the dreaded Baby Bowser. Loosely based on the Super NES classic Yoshi's Island, Yoshi's Story fully exploits the strengths of the N64. Yoshi can walk, run, swim, leap, flutter and fire his payload of eggs with unerring precision. NL.name: Yoshi's Story™
NL.description: Aan de briljante geest van Shigeru Miyamoto, de bedenker van Super Mario 64, is een schitterend spel ontsproten met een gegarandeerd sprookjeseinde. Volg de avonturen van zes Yoshi's op hun zoektocht door zonnige wouden, donkere grotten, hoge bergen, dampende jungles, immense oceanen en duistere kastelen. Ze zijn op zoek naar de Super Happy Tree, die is gestolen door de alom gevreesde Baby Bowser. Yoshi's Story is losjes gebaseerd op de Super NES klassieker Yoshi's Island, en maakt volledig gebruik van de kracht van de N64. Yoshi kan lopen, rennen, zwemmen, springen, fladderen en zijn lading eieren met onfeilbare precisie afvuren. De actie vindt plaats in de 'pagina's' van een sprookjesboek, die zijn gemaakt van papierachtige materialen en andere bekende materialen: bossen zo dun als wafels, wolken van spijkerstof en opblaasbare eilanden van plastic. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Yoshi's Story™
NZ.description: From the brilliant mind of Super Mario 64 creator Shigeru Miyamoto comes a gorgeous game with a guaranteed storybook ending. Follow the adventures of six Yoshis as they search through sunny woods, dark caves, soaring mountains, steaming jungles, vast oceans and gloomy castles for the Super Happy Tree, which has been stolen by the dreaded Baby Bowser. Loosely based on the Super NES classic Yoshi's Island, Yoshi's Story fully exploits the strengths of the N64. PL.name: Yoshi's Story™
PL.description: From the brilliant mind of Super Mario 64 creator Shigeru Miyamoto comes a gorgeous game with a guaranteed storybook ending. PT.name: Yoshi's Story™
PT.description: Da mente brilhante de Shigeru Miyamoto, criador de Super Mario 64, chega-nos um fabuloso jogo com final de conto de fadas garantido. Acompanha as aventuras de seis Yoshis à medida que eles atravessam bosques soalheiros, cavernas sombrias, montanhas imponentes, selvas húmidas, vastos oceanos e castelos tenebrosos em busca da Super Happy Tree, que foi roubada pelo temível Bowser Bebé. Baseado no clássico da Super Nintendo Yoshi's Island, Yoshi's Story utiliza ao máximo as capacidades da Nintendo 64. O Yoshi pode andar, correr, nadar, saltar, esvoaçar e disparar os seus ovos com precisão infalível. A ação tem lugar nas "páginas" de um livro de contos feito com material que imita papel e outras texturas familiares. Prepara-te para veres florestas estreitas como folhas de papel, nuvens de tecido e ilhas de plástico insuflável. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Yoshi's Story™
RU.description: Выдающийся создатель Super Mario 64, Сигэру Миямото, представляет великолепную игру с окончанием, не хуже чем у хорошей книги. Присоединяйтесь к приключениям шести Йоши, которые прочесывают солнечные леса, темные пещеры, высокие горы, жаркие джунгли, бескрайние океаны и мрачные замки в поисках Super Happy Tree (Невероятно Веселого Дерева), похищенного ужасным Малышом Боузером. Созданная в духе классической игры Yoshi's Island для системы Super NES, Yoshi's Story полностью использует мощь системы Nintendo 64. Йоши может ходить, бегать, плавать, прыгать, планировать и бросаться яйцами с невероятной точностью. Действие игры происходит на «страницах» книги, созданной из бумагоподобных и других схожих материалов. Здесь вы увидите леса толщиной с волосок, джинсовые облака и надувные пластиковые острова. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: Yoshi's Story™
SE.description: From the brilliant mind of Super Mario 64 creator Shigeru Miyamoto comes a gorgeous game with a guaranteed storybook ending. Follow the adventures of six Yoshis as they search through sunny woods, dark caves, soaring mountains, steaming jungles, vast oceans and gloomy castles for the Super Happy Tree, which has been stolen by the dreaded Baby Bowser. Loosely based on the Super NES classic Yoshi's Island, Yoshi's Story fully exploits the strengths of the N64. Yoshi can walk, run, swim, leap, flutter and fire his payload of eggs with unerring precision. The action takes place in storybook 'pages' made up of papery materials and other familiar textures – so you'll see wafer-thin forests, denim clouds and inflatable plastic islands. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

US.name: Yoshi's Story™
US.description: Baby Bowser has taken the Super Happy Tree and put a spell on Yoshi Island. It's up to a few remaining Yoshis to restore everything to its rightful place as they run, ground-pound, flutter-jump, throw eggs, and traverse a colorful and crafted storybook-looking world. Complete a course in Story Mode, and then best your high score in Trial Mode!
